item.description: Turn off of the D. W. Highway onto Hawthorne Drive (where the sign for the Danial Webster Animal Hospital is and proceed 0.3 miles, having pasted the Elegant Touch Gourmet Cafe on purpose. Turn left at Station Rd and proceed 0.2 miles taking the 2nd left (which is a dirt road). The dirt road goes under the 293 highway bridges that cross the Merrimack River ending at a parking lot for a boat launch. The hike will start from there. The only reason I gave the Elegant Touch Cafe as the address was it was the only address that I could get google maps to recognize that would give you directions to the start of Hawthorne Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: Following the directions on how to get to the Elegant Touch Gourmet Cafe will get you on Hawthorne Drive once on Hawthorne Drive follow the directions next to the picture.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Heritage Trail along the Merrimack River, Bedford, NH
